org.apache.flex.abc.semantics

Class InstructionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.abc.semantics.InstructionFactory

  • public abstract class InstructionFactory
extends Object
    The InstructionFactory creates implementation Instruction subclasses for particular types of Instructions, and also handles caching and pooling of shared Instructions.

      • getInstruction

        public static final Instruction getInstruction(int opcode)
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of an instruction with no operands, or a "blank" instruction whose operands are to be filled in.

        Returns:
        an Instruction with an immediate operand.

      • getDeferredImmediateInstruction

        public static final Instruction getDeferredImmediateInstruction(int opcode)
        Returns:
        an immediate-operand instruction in cases where the immediate operand is not yet known.

      • getTargetableInstruction

        public static final Instruction getTargetableInstruction(int opcode)
        Returns:
        a single-operand instruction, with the operand TBA.

      • getInstruction

        public static final Instruction getInstruction(int opcode,
                         Object[] operands)
        Returns:
        an Instruction with an arbitrary number of operands.

      • getHasnext2Instruction

        Returns:

      • createModifiedInstruction

        public static final Instruction createModifiedInstruction(int opcode,
                                    Instruction original)
        Copy an instruction's operands as necessary and substitute a new opcode.
        Parameters:
        opcode - - the opcode required.
        original - - the original instruction.
        Returns:
        an instruction with the original instruction's operands, whatever they may be, and the specified novel opcode.
